text: Nedbaylo or Nedbailo (Недбайло) is a Ukrainian-language surname. It may refer to: *Anatoly Nedbaylo, Soviet World War II pilot, twice Hero of the Soviet Union *Tatiana Nedbaylo, Kyrgyz gymnast *Petr Emelyanovich Nedbailo, a 1968 recipient of the United Nations Prize in the Field of Human Rights Category:Ukrainian-language surnames
title: Nedbaylo
